message: Facebook is removing the messaging capability from its mobile web application, according to a notice being served to users: “Your conversations are moving to Messenger,” it reads. Welcome news to the millions like me who switched to the web app in order to avoid Messenger in the first place!
story: Morad Edwar shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Facebook is disabling messaging in its mobile web app to push people to Messenger
caption: social.techcrunch.com
description: Facebook is removing the messaging capability from its mobile web application, according to a notice being served to users: "Your conversations are moving to..

data.message: That Means U Have To Get Messenger To Chat ! Otherwise U Have To Get A Modded Facebook App Which Combine Both Together !

Just noticed it and was wondering how long it'll take till it gets Medusa attention!

There is a current workaround, but who knows how long it'll work.

https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=10154085655990170&id=544815169&ref=bookmarks
Why use an app when you can use Facebook inside the browser? I never really understood why people use the app.
isn't messenger has its own webapp?
why forcing people to use a stupid app ? 'o.0
